report.title: Nothing Psychedelic About This
report.author: Mike
report.bodytext: I consumed 12g of Amanita Muscaria which I purchased from the internet in three different ways. /n /n I ate 4 grams on a bagel with Peanut Butter (it didn't taste that bad but knowing what I was eating reminded me of regular shrooms which made me gag, this made consuming a little easier) /n /n 4 grams in soggy tea with honey /n /n 4 grams capsulated /n /n I did all of this within minutes of each other. Very long coming up. About 2 hours for effects to kick in. /n /n 2 hours after consumption I noticed vision blurry. Half hour latter I began to sweat and salivate. Then began hot flashes. Cold and sweating, then hot and sweating. Then back and forth. This lasted 3 hours and then the effects started to tapper off. /n /n No visuals. No disassociated thinking. No insight. Not mind expanding. All this ended up doing was giving me some wicked bad gas hours after consumption and then the whole next day. /n /n Basically this mushroom is lame, and a waste of time.
